setting.name: Validate Source Text Markup
setting.description: Run a basic markup validation check on the incoming source text.

setting.name: Group Component Type
setting.description: The type of components that are to be used for this group. (Only one is allowed.)

setting.name: Group Components
setting.description: A list of components of a single type that will be included in this group.

setting.name: Group Lock Setting
setting.description: Lock setting for this group. When locked, no modifications can be made to group components.

setting.name: Group Post Process Scripts
setting.description: A list of a scripts that can be used for a varity of postprocessing on this type of component.

setting.name: Use Group Preprocess Script
setting.description: Use preprocessing script on incoming component text for this group.

setting.name: Use Group Macros
setting.description: Use group-level macros for rendering text for this group.

setting.name: Use Group Hyphenation
setting.description: Use hyphenation on group text.

setting.name: Use Group Illustrations
setting.description: Use illustrations in this group text.

setting.name: Use Manual Adjustments
setting.description: Use manual paragraph adjustments.

setting.name: Starting Page Number
setting.description: If page numbers are used, this will tell the renderer what page number to begin with. This is incase this group follows another group.

setting.name: Total Pages in Group
setting.description: Each time a group is rendered Rapuma will record the total pages.

setting.name: Preceding Group
setting.description: The group that precedes this one. This information is needed for setting page numbers.

setting.name: Include in TOC
setting.description: Set to True if this group is to be included in the Table of Contents.

setting.name: TOC Section Title
setting.description: Assuming section titles are being use, if this group begins a new section, this field can contain the section title. However, this is not required.

setting.name: Component Style Override List
setting.description: A list of components that will have style override files created for them. A corresponding reset file will be made as well. The user must edit both files correctly for this to work properly.

setting.name: Component TeX Macro Override List
setting.description: A list of components that will have TeX override macro files created for them. A corresponding reset file will be made as well. The user must edit both files correctly for this to work properly.

setting.name: Use Group Style Override
setting.description: Set to true if a group style override file will be needed/used for rendering components in this group.

setting.name: Use Group TeX Override
setting.description: Set to true if a group TeX override macro file will be needed/used for rendering components in this group.

setting.name: Binding Order
setting.description: The order that this group will be bound. If "0" (zero) is used, the group will be excluded from binding. Default = 0

setting.name: Binding File
setting.description: The path and file name of the last rendering of this group which will be bound (if a binding order is specified). This is created automatically at render time. There is no way for the system to know if the file is correct or not, so if it is not, it will be bound just the same.
